abstract: Seven states, including New York and California, have joined the Justice Department’s lawsuit seeking to block AT&T’s $39 billion proposed acquisition of T-Mobile USA.
snippet: Seven states, including New York and California, have joined the Justice Department’s lawsuit seeking to block AT&T’s $39 billion proposed acquisition of T-Mobile USA.
lead_paragraph: Seven states, including California, Pennsylvania, Ohio, Illinois and New York, said Friday they had joined the Justice Department’s efforts to block AT&T’s $39 billion purchase of T-Mobile USA.

headline.main: 7 States Join Justice Dept. Suit to Block AT&T Deal
